sentences.en: Are you displeased with my work?
sentences.cn: 你对我的工作不满意吗？

sentences.en: He'd do anything rather than displease his parents.
sentences.cn: 他无论如何也不会惹父母生气.

sentences.en: If there are aspects of your life that displease you make you feel regret, this is an opportunity to change direction.
sentences.cn: 如果你生活中那些使你不愉快的方面让你觉得懊悔，那么这正是你改变方向的时机。

sentences.en: It will be prudent not to displease your higher - ups, if you ask for my advice.
sentences.cn: 如果您征求我的意见,那么明智的做法就是不要得罪上司.

sentences.en: It would be prudent not to displease your higher - ups, if you ask for my advice.
sentences.cn: 如果您征求我的意见,那么明智的做法就是不要得罪您的上司.

sentences.en: No sooner had I uttered the words than I could have kicked myself, for I knew they would displease him.
sentences.cn: 话才一出口,我就责备自己, 因为知道这些话会使他不高兴的.

sentences.en: Not wishing to displease her, he avoided answering the question.
sentences.cn: 为了不惹她生气，他对这个问题避而不答。

sentences.en: She couldn't afford to displease her boss.
She pulls a long face as soon as anything happens to displease her.
sentences.cn: 遇到不如意的事,她马上就会沉下脸来.

sentences.en: There's always something about success that displease even your best friend.
sentences.cn: 成功总带有一些连好朋友也为之感到不愉快的东西.

sentences.en: Turn back and go in peace ; do nothing to displease the Philistine rulers.
sentences.cn: 7现在你可以 平平安安 地回去,免得非利士人的首领不欢喜你.

sentences.en: Well, I can't afford to displease my boss.
sentences.cn: 哎, 我可得罪不起我的老板.

sentences.en: Wherefore now return , and go in peace , that thou displease not the lords of the Philistines.
sentences.cn: 现在你可以平平安安地回去, 免得非利士人的首领不欢喜你.

sentences.en: Your letter is always full of things displease me.
sentences.cn: 您的信件总是充分的使我生气的事.

words.tran_cn: 使…不快（displease的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to make sb feel upset, annoyed or not satisfied

trans.tran_cn: 使生气，使不愉快，冒犯，触怒
